Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Provides for the administration of the state cemetery vandalism restoration, monument repair or removal and administration fund by the state cemetery board
Summary: Provides for the administration of the state cemetery vandalism restoration, monument repair or removal and administration fund by the state cemetery board; removes the state comptroller and commissioner of taxation and finance from administering the fund.
LawCode: Amd ยง1504, N-PC L; amd ยง97-r, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the not-for-profit corporation law and the state finance law, in relation to the administration of the state cemetery vandalism restoration fund by the state cemetery board
